channel.title: The Art of Technology... Training - Josef Seiler and Chris Kefalas

item.title: Notes On Setting Up Your Robot
item.description:
Some Notes on Configuring the BombiniBot

Three Preceding Steps to Control your BombiniBot Robot

  1. Download the Scratch based programming environment from mindsensors.com and choose the windows link or the mac link depending on your operating system.

    i) This will download as a compressed (zip) file, so unzip the folder â€¦
